Class LegendGraphic

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable
public class LegendGraphic
extends AbstractContentBlock
implements org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable

The graphical item within a legend item.
